text: A program executes 1,000,000 memory references. When run on a system containing a particular cache, the cache has a miss rate of 10% of which % are compulsory misses, i are capacity misses and i are conflict misses. If you increase the associativity and size of cache what is the maximum number of misses that you can hope to eliminate, assuming the block size remains same? (Rounded off to two decimal places)
